films.name: John Wick
films.description: John Wick is a high-octane action thriller film directed by Chad Stahelski and David Leitch. It follows the story of John Wick, a retired hitman, who seeks vengeance against those who wronged him after the death of his beloved dog, a final gift from his deceased wife.

films.name: Skyscraper
films.description: Skyscraper is an action thriller film written and directed by Rawson Marshall Thurber. The film stars Dwayne Johnson as a former FBI agent who must rescue his family from a newly built skyscraper, the tallest in the world, after it is taken over by criminals and set on fire.
